LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Ballista.label: ballista
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Ballista.description: An ancient military siege engine in the form of a crossbow mounted on a wooden construct. Bolts fired from this machine explode into splinters on impact.
LanguageData.VFES_Bullet_Ballista.label: ballista bolt
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_BallistaTurret.label: ballista
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_BallistaTurret.description: An ancient military siege engine in a form of a crossbow mounted on a wooden construct.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Catapult.label: catapult
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Catapult.description: A catapult is a ballistic device used to launch a projectile a great distance without the aid of gunpowder or other propellants. In use since ancient times, the catapult has proven to be one of the most persistently effective mechanisms in warfare.
LanguageData.VFES_Artillery_Catapult.label: catapult
LanguageData.VFES_Artillery_Catapult.description: A catapult is a ballistic device used to launch a projectile a great distance without the aid of gunpowder or other propellants. In use since ancient times, the catapult has proven to be one of the most persistently effective mechanisms in warfare.
LanguageData.VFES_Artillery_Rock.label: massive boulder
